actions.description: The ogre makes two Bash attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the ogre can push the target 5 feet away if the target is Huge or smaller.
actions.name: Bash

specialTraits.description: The ogre deals double damage to objects and structures.
specialTraits.name: Siege Monster
